title: "statistique sur les donnée"

About this site




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse) ; # loads core libraries for data manipulation
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.1     ✔ stringr   1.5.2
✔ ggplot2   4.0.0     ✔ tibble    3.3.0
✔ lubridate 1.9.4     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.1.0     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
catastrophes <- read_csv("donnee et data frame final/catastrophes.csv") ; # imports catastrophes data
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 543 Columns: 50
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (29): dis_no, seq, glide, disaster_group, disaster_subgroup, disaster_ty...
dbl (20): year, dis_mag_value, start_year, start_month, start_day, end_year,...
lgl  (1): aid_contribution_thousand_usd

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
synop_csv <- read_csv("donnee et data frame final/synop.csv.gz") ; # imports synop data
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 1478834 Columns: 11
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
dbl (11): numer_sta, date, pmer, dd, ff, t, u, year, month, day, hour

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::




You need to end up with a data set containing monthly data for the following variables: • year • month • average temperature of the month in Celsius degrees • gap between the month’s temperature (variable above) and the overall average temperatures for this month (across all years) • total number of natural disasters in France for this month • total number of damages, in dollars, in France for this month • total number of deaths in France for this month




::: {.cell}
